name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Copilot: AI Assistant Powered by ChatGPT, GPT-4o, Claude, Gemini + AI Tools

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: AI-enhanced productivity extension with personal tutoring utilising ChatGPT, Claude, and Gemini, plus AI tools and AI images.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Transform Your Learning and Productivity with Copilot for Chrome 🚀

Meet Copilot, your revolutionary ChatGPT AI-powered personal tutor for Chrome, leveraging the latest GPT-4 technology. Copilot isn’t just an extension; it’s your gateway to a smarter, more efficient online experience.

Unveiling a Collection of Cutting-Edge Features:

Personalized Learning Companion 📘:

➡️ Choose Your AI’s Personality: Select from four distinct personalities, each crafted to make your interactions engaging and personalized. 🎭

➡️ Voice Integration: Choose from six natural voices for Copilot to read aloud text, making learning more interactive. 🔊

➡️ Customizable Learning: Tell Copilot about your learning preferences for a tailored educational experience. 🌱

On-Demand Support with Sidebar 💬:

➡️ AI ChatGPT Anywhere: Access AI support on any website, powered by a variety of AI models including GPT-3.5, GPT-4o, Claude 3 Haiku, Claude 3.5 Sonnet, Gemini 1.5 Flash, and Gemini 1.5 Pro for instant knowledge and companionship. Revisit past conversations with chat history. 🌐

➡️ Compose Feature: Enhance your writing with AI, from emails to creative content, making writer’s block a thing of the past. ✍️

➡️ Read Page Feature: Analyze any webpage instantly, accessing summaries, key points, and key concepts of the page you are currently viewing. 📃

*New* File Upload Feature 📁:

➡️ Multi-File Chat: Upload and chat about up to 6 files simultaneously, including documents, PDFs and more. Quickly dive into and resolve issues within your files, with AI guidance at your fingertips.

YouTube Vision 🎥:

➡️ Summarize and Extract Key Points: Easily summarize and extract the most important information from any YouTube video.

➡️ Moment Finder: Locate specific moments within a video by simply describing the moment you’re looking for, saving time and effort.

Image Generation 📸

Create any image you can imagine with the most advanced image generation AI models right at your fingertips! 🌄

AI Copilot Enhanced Search 🔎:

➡️ AI-Driven Insights: Transform your Google searches into rich learning experiences with AI-powered insights. 💡

➡️ Interactive AI Chat: Explore topics deeper with an AI chat, enriching your knowledge post-search. 🗨️

Quick Actions ⚡:

➡️ Web Explainer: Effortlessly demystify complex online content by highlighting text. Tailor explanations to your understanding level, from ‘Like I’m 5’ to expert. All shortcut keys are customizable in Copilot’s settings. 🧐

Simple Installation 🛠️:

Pin Copilot to your Chrome extensions bar.
Log in or sign up with Google to activate features.
Refresh your tabs to welcome Copilot into your web journey.
Embark on a Transformative Digital Journey:

Copilot is more than an extension; it’s a commitment to building the world’s greatest educational tool focusing on innovation, user experience, privacy, and security.

At the core of our ethos is the belief in AI’s power to positively transform lives. We’re dedicated to safely integrating AI into everyday experiences, enhancing productivity for all - from students to professionals. Copilot is designed with the community in mind, ensuring each update brings us closer to a world where technology empowers and enriches.

Install now and discover unprecedented digital productivity.
